EmailTemplate.name: External Newsletter.2017-10-26
EmailTemplate.subject: It's a GIF World. We Just Live In It.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
OCTOBER 26, 2017 <[[https://builttoadapt.io/its-a-gif-world-we-just-live-in-it-6da025ac4937?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> It’s a GIF World. We Just Live In It. Take a deep-dive into the cultural, design, technical, and business implications of the internet's favorite file format. The Rise of the GIF <[[https://builttoadapt.io/its-a-gif-world-we-just-live-in-it-6da025ac4937?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/what-happens-after-the-mvp-eaa7de08e917?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> What Happens After the MVP? Adam Piel explains why your project might benefit from a release map. Learn More <[[https://builttoadapt.io/what-happens-after-the-mvp-eaa7de08e917?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/container-runtime-the-foundry-and-more-from-cloud-foundry-summit-europe-ep-47?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Container Runtime, The Foundry and More from Cloud Foundry Summit Europe (Ep. 47) Zach Brown and Steven Benario join Jeff and Dormain to talk Cloud Foundry Container Runtime (formerly Kubo), The Foundry, and Cloud Foundry Summit event. Listen and Subscribe <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/container-runtime-the-foundry-and-more-from-cloud-foundry-summit-europe-ep-47?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-banner&utm_campaign=s1p-registration]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/the-total-economic-impact-of-pivotal-cloud-foundry?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> The Total Economic Impact of Pivotal Cloud Foundry Forrester Consulting conducted a Total Economic Impact™ (TEI) study that examines the potential return on investment of Pivotal Cloud Foundry, including both quantifiable and qualifiable results. Get the Study <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/the-total-economic-impact-of-pivotal-cloud-foundry?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[http://www.defenseone.com/ideas/2017/10/how-us-air-force-made-its-isr-network-cheaper-run-and-easier-upgrade/141806/]]> How the US Air Force Made Its ISR Network Cheaper to Run and Easier to Upgrade Defense One features how the US Air Force adopted a Silicon Valley state of mind and overhauled their main intelligence-data network, DCGS. Check it Out <[[http://www.defenseone.com/ideas/2017/10/how-us-air-force-made-its-isr-network-cheaper-run-and-easier-upgrade/141806/]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/pivotal-container-service-pks-with-cornelia-davis-and-such-ep-81?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Pivotal Container Service (PKS), with Cornelia Davis and such (Ep. 81) Coté and Seroter talk with Cornelia Davis about PKS and her upcoming book, Cloud Native. Listen In <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/pivotal-container-service-pks-with-cornelia-davis-and-such-ep-81?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S2oO-t-E38c&feature=youtu.be]]> Blue-Green Deployment of Applications leveraging RabbitMQ Online upgrade of applications that use RabbitMQ using RabbitMQ Federated Queues. Watch Now <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S2oO-t-E38c&feature=youtu.be]]> Upcoming Events 10/29-10/30 Cloud-Native Architecture Fundamentals, New York <[[https://conferences.oreilly.com/software-architecture/sa-training-ny/public/schedule/detail/63240]]>
10/31 Pivotal Open House, Sydney <[[https://pivotal.io/event/sydney-open-house?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]>
11/1 Greenplum 5.0 Showcase, Washington D.C. <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/GPDB5.0-Showcase-WashingtonDC.html?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]>
11/7 Operationalizing Data Science: The Right Architecture and Tools, Webinar <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/nov-7-operationalizing-data-science-the-right-architecture-and-tools-webinar?utm_source=social&utm_medium=link&utm_campaign=ops-data-science-2-q417]]>
